note:
The tragedy is that the majority of people only recognize problems when they affected are affected by them. When it is too late.

If I follow you it means that I put a lot of value on your content. It doesn't have to be the other way around. Please don't follow me just because I follow you. The well-intentioned gesture doesn't work if you're not interested in what I have to say. That's ok and fine. I won't be offended or anything :) Just be happy that I follow you.
